mapper.select:
SELECT N.NO, N.TITLE, CONCAT(SUBSTR(CONTENT, 1, 28),'...') AS CONTENT, SUBSTR(WRITE_DATE, 1, 8) AS WRITE_DATE, N.DELETE_YN, A.ID AS ADMIN_NO FROM NOTICE N INNER JOIN ADMIN A ON A.NO = N.ADMIN_NO
WHERE ${category} LIKE '%${keyword}%'
ORDER BY NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE ( TITLE, CONTENT, WRITE_DATE ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{content}, SYSDATE )
